dict.acceptation: 橡胶；橡皮；决胜局；避孕套；
扭转脖子看；好奇地引颈而望；

sent.orig: Divided by the Materials: oil rubber, heat-resistant rubber, acid-resistant rubber, conductive rubber, shock-proof rubber.
sent.trans: 按材料分为：耐油橡胶，耐热橡胶，耐酸橡胶，导电橡胶，防震橡胶。

sent.orig: Its import product is synthetic rubber, including nitril butadiene rubber and ethylene-propylene-non-conjugated diene rubber.
sent.trans: 进口产品是合成橡胶，主要包括丁腈橡胶及三元乙丙橡胶。

sent.orig: Rubber to natural rubber or synthetic rubber as raw material and take handcrafted or moulding.
sent.trans: 橡胶版以天然橡胶或合不败橡胶为质料，拔取手工雕镂或模压法制不败。

sent.orig: Contraceptives and Condoms, Gloves and Mittens Rubber and Rubber Products, Glove, Rubber Packing.
sent.trans: 采购产品避孕剂和避孕套，手套和棒球手套，橡皮和橡皮产品，手套，橡皮。

sent.orig: Main Flocking doormat rubber, rubber products and rubber volume only.
sent.trans: 主营橡胶植绒门垫、橡胶制品及橡胶卷才。
